set totalResult = "" set context = ##class(VKReader.Data.Context).%New() set i = 1 set pageSize = 100 for { kill result do ##class(%iKnow.Queries.SourceAPI).GetByDomain(.result, context.DomainID, i, pageSize) if ($data(result) = 0) { return totalResult } set p = "" for { set p = $order(result(p)) if (p '= "") { set tExternalId = $list(result(p), 2) set tSourceId = ##class(%iKnow.Queries.SourceAPI).GetSourceId(context.DomainID, tExternalId) set tTitle = ..GetTitle(context.DomainID, tSourceId) set tDate = ..GetDate(context.DomainID, tExternalId, "PostDate") set tTime = ..GetTime(context.DomainID, tExternalId, "PostTime") set tCity = ##class(%iKnow.Queries.MetadataAPI).GetValue(context.DomainID, "AuthorCity", tExternalId) set tCountry = ##class(%iKnow.Queries.MetadataAPI).GetValue(context.DomainID, "AuthorCountry", tExternalId) set tDOB = ..GetDate(context.DomainID, tExternalId, "AuthorDOB") set tSex = ..GetSex(context.DomainID, tExternalId, "AuthorSex") set tLink = ..GetLinkToProfile(context.DomainID, tExternalId, "AuthorID") set tEC = ##class(%iKnow.Queries.MetadataAPI).GetValue(context.DomainID, ##class(Misc.DomainEmotionalColoringCounter).%GetParameter("EmotionalColoringField"), tExternalId)
set tRow = $lb(tSourceId, tTitle, tDate, tTime, tCity, tCountry, tDOB, tSex, tLink, tEC) set totalResult = totalResult _ ..PrintTableRow(tRow) } else { quit } } set i = i + 1 } quit totalResult
